description: seated nude male figure seen from PL with body slightly turned to PL; PR arm raised, PL arm resting on thigh, with hands in loose fists; dark hair
marks:

on back, in pencil: [PIETRO FANCELL
medium: Black chalk over gray wash on wove paper
provenance: La Société historique et littéraire polonaise, Paris (until 1972; sale, Christie's, London, July 4, 1972, part of no. 54, for 40 gns., to Mathews); [Alister Mathews, Bournemouth, England, 1972-74; sold, September 8, for £40, to Moir]; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1974-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Nude Male Academy
